snippet: The zookeeper, John Bradford, was fatally injured when the elephant made a sudden movement inside the area at the Dickinson Park Zoo where the elephants are housed, a spokeswoman said.
abstract: John Bradford, longtime zookeeper in Springfield, Mo, is fatally injured by a female elephant  inside the Dickinson Park Zoo.
lead_paragraph: The zookeeper, John Bradford, was fatally injured when the elephant made a sudden movement inside the area at the Dickinson Park Zoo where the elephants are housed, a spokeswoman said.
